extensiondescription.message: Extension allowing you to easily change the pitch in YouTube videos.

errordesc.message: It seems like something went wrong. Reload the website and try again, if this continues happening please hit us up on GitHub.

errornoyoutube.message: Pitchrome is not compatible with this website. Compatible websites: %s

warnnotfound.message: The video element was not detected by the background script, this will render pitch controls unusable. Please reload the website and try again.
